1651.text: over here who are beginning to look quite professional.

1654.text:
- That would pass, that would pass. 
- 1,500 programmes, my goodness.

1658.text: This is impressive. You didn't really have to sweat too much there.

1661.text: We say commiserations to our Challengers, The Pilot Swans.

1665.text: The Eggheads have done what comes naturally to them.

1669.text: I'm afraid it means you won't be going home with the 25,000,

1672.text: so the money rolls over to our next show.

1674.text: Eggheads, very well done, this was.

1676.text: Seeing you when you don't even look like you're too

1678.text: worried is impressive, I must say.

1681.text: Join us next time to see

1682.text: if a new team of Challengers have the brains to defeat the Eggheads.

1685.text: At some point they will. Will it be next time?

1688.text: £26,000 says it won't. Till then, goodbye.
